remarks: Double restricted existential uniqueness implies double restricted uniqueness quantification, analogous to ~ 2exeu .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Jun-2017.)
statement:
2rexreu $p |- ( ( E! x e. A E. y e. B ph /\ E! y e. B E. x e. A ph ) -> E! x e. A E! y e. B ph ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B x $.
$d x y $.
